forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a few showers this morning. Cloudy skies during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning, then remaining overcast and windy during the afternoon hours. High near 50F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
